```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```

# Page 1

## Row 1

```{r, warning=FALSE}
p1 <- ggplot(data = starwars, aes(x = mass, y = height, text = name)) +
  geom_point()

ggplotly(p1) 
```

## Row 2 {.tabset}

```{r}
#| title: Bar Chart

p2 <- ggplot(data = starwars, aes(x = name, y = height)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = .5, hjust = 1))

ggplotly(p2)
```

```{r}
#| title: Table

starwars <- starwars %>% 
  select(name, height, mass, gender, homeworld, species)

knitr::kable(starwars)
```

# Page 2

## Row 1

```{r}
ggplot(data = starwars, aes(x = mass, y = height)) +
  geom_point()
```
